price: Katika upepo wa moto, na maji yanayo chemka,
footnotes: Watakuwa kwenye upepo umoto utakao wazunguka, unao penya katika tundu za mwili, na maji yaliyo chemshwa motoni wayanywe na wamiminiwe vichwani,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
